column4: Rdesctop with this command rdesktop -A -s "c:\seamlessrdp\seamlessrdpshell.exe c:windowsexplorer.exe" localhost:3389 -u administrator -p XXXXXXX                     is giving me this error                                             Autoselected keyboard map en-us
c:windowsexplorer.exe isnt a valid path for a program.

isnt a valid path It functioned , started the whole desktop full screan.  then I applied this                      Go to Start -> Run, type regedit and hit enter. The Registry Editor will open, navigate to HKEY_CURRENT_USER -> Software -> Microsoft -> Windows -> CurrentVersion -> Policies -> Explorer, right click on the right side, select New -> DWORD Value, name it NoDesktop, double click on it and set the Value data to 1 instead of 0. Click OK an
I dont know what you are asking. I dont see anything about going into the windows registry on https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SeamlessVirtualization
